properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 10:36PM PST until February 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...MOUNTAIN SNOW OVER THE WEEKEND...

.A weather system will pass over the Pacific Northwest bringing
moderate to heavy mountain snow. Snow will continue overnight and
into Sunday morning. Gusty winds could lead to areas of blowing
and drifting snow. More light mountain snow showers expected
Sunday afternoon into President's Day.

* WHAT...Snow above 3500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of
2 to 5 inches. Some blowing and drifting snow will be possible
tonight and Sunday.

* WHERE...Wallowa County.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET
